segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, focused intently on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware she is of the water flooding over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think about the mess that is growing beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is gradually widening, yet she’s completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her knee-length dress and apron make her look quite domestic and content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that blissful indifference could lead to a disaster any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight pouring through the window contrasts with the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
